overview:
Heather Inocencio is the SVP of Tech/Product Development for J. Hilburn, a custom men’s clothier. In her role, Heather leads product strategy and development across digital platforms to support J. Hilburn Partners and customers.

Heather brings a pedigree of Product Management expertise to her role at J.Hilburn, with extensive leadership experience in strategy and innovation across emerging technologies, from e-commerce and analytics to mobile and social. Prior to J.Hilburn, Heather was VP of Product at HauteLook, a leading flash sale site that launched in 2007 and was acquired by Nordstrom in 2011. Before HauteLook, Heather was VP, Product Management and Marketing, at MyLife.com, directing Product, User Experience and Marketing strategies through the companyâ€™s rebranding and repositioning from Reunion.com to MyLife.com.

Heather began her Product Management career with roles at United Online, Teleflora, Pegasystems, Inc., and MCI Telecommunications, and originally hails from Atlanta, Georgia.
